character_select.title: CHOOSE YOUR HERO
character_select.instructions: A/D or Arrows to navigate  |  SPACE/ENTER to select  |  ESC to go back
character_select.unlock_hint: Complete challenges to unlock this hero!

frost_mage.name: Frost Mage
frost_mage.title: The Frozen One
frost_mage.description: A wise wizard who harnesses the power of ice to slow and freeze enemies.

pyromancer.name: Pyromancer
pyromancer.title: The Flame Bearer
pyromancer.description: A fierce mage who uses devastating fire magic, burning everything in their path.

storm_caller.name: Storm Caller
storm_caller.title: The Tempest
storm_caller.description: Master of lightning who strikes multiple enemies with chained attacks.

arcanist.name: Arcanist
arcanist.title: The Mystic
arcanist.description: Scholar of arcane arts who manipulates raw magical energy.

shadow_blade.name: Shadow Blade
shadow_blade.title: The Phantom
shadow_blade.description: Deadly assassin who attacks from the shadows with lethal precision.

druid.name: Druid
druid.title: The Nature Guardian
druid.description: Protector of nature who commands plants and forest creatures.

wind_runner.name: Wind Runner
wind_runner.title: The Swift
wind_runner.description: Swift warrior who uses the wind to move at incredible speeds.

geomancer.name: Geomancer
geomancer.title: The Stone Shaper
geomancer.description: Master of earth who creates barriers and crushes enemies with rocks.

paladin.name: Paladin
paladin.title: The Holy Knight
paladin.description: Holy warrior who heals allies and smites evil with divine light.

void_walker.name: Void Walker
void_walker.title: The Abyss Touched
void_walker.description: Mysterious entity who harnesses the power of the void to devastate enemies.

ice_wand.name: Ice Wand
ice_wand.description: Fires ice projectiles that slow enemies.

fire_wand.name: Fire Wand
fire_wand.description: Shoots fireballs that burn enemies over time.

lightning_wand.name: Lightning Wand
lightning_wand.description: Fires lightning bolts that chain to nearby enemies.

shadow_dagger.name: Shadow Dagger
shadow_dagger.description: Throws daggers that pierce through enemies.

nature_staff.name: Nature Staff
nature_staff.description: Summons thorny vines that entangle enemies.

void_bolt.name: Void Bolt
void_bolt.description: Fires void energy that ignores armor.

burning_soul.name: Burning Soul
burning_soul.description: Attacks have 15% chance to ignite enemies

static_field.name: Static Field
static_field.description: Lightning damage chains to 1 additional enemy

tailwind.name: Tailwind
tailwind.description: Movement speed increases by 5% for each kill

stone_skin.name: Stone Skin
stone_skin.description: Take 15% less damage when standing still

divine_protection.name: Divine Protection
divine_protection.description: Survive fatal damage once per run

void_absorption.name: Void Absorption
void_absorption.description: 10% of damage dealt is converted to health
